None.Name: Ritual of Recovery
None.Description: Every friendly unit in the current game benefits 85% more from any regenerating ability for 30 seconds. Has a 60 seconds cool-down after the building was built. Reusable every 60 seconds.

None.Name: Aura of Recovery
None.Description: Friendly units within a 20m radius will regenerate 2% of their maximum life points every 2 seconds. Cannot be disabled by spellblocking abilities.

en.Description:
Ritual of Recovery: +10% Bonus to regenerating effects.
Aura of Recovery: +1% Regeneration per 2 seconds

Ritual of Recovery: +10% Bonus to regenerating effects.
Aura of Recovery: +1% Regeneration per 2 seconds

Ritual of Recovery: +5% Bonus to regenerating effects.
Aura of Recovery: +1% Regeneration per 2 seconds

Extra.en: Unlike the card states,  Ritual of Recovery increases healing done by every source,  not just abilities,  but also spells.
